title: Cost per km
description: We recommend setting a value between KSH 30 to KSH 35. This range will gurantee a fair pay for your rider and will cover their return trip.
label: PICKUP/DELIVERY POLICY

title: Minimum delivery fee
description: What is the minimum cost for a delivery? Most riders and delivery services will charge a minimum of KSH 50 for a short trip.
label: REFUNDS AND RETURN POLICY
